definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: lodging-place, inn, khan;—abs. ´[[מ]] Ge 42:27 + 5 t.; cstr. [[מְלוֹן]] 2Ki 19:23, Je 9:1; —lodging-place, inn, khan (?) Ge 42:27, Ge 43:21, Ex 4:24; [[אׂרְתִים]] ´[[מְ]] Je 9:1; = camp (of Isr.) for a night, Jos 4:3 ( + [[לין]]), v:Jos 4:8; of Assyrians Is 10:29; fig. [[מְלוֹן קִצּׂה֠]] 2Ki 19:23, i.e. its (Lebanon's) remotest camping-ground, hyperb. of Assyrian conquest; so rd. prob. in ‖ Is 37:24 for MT ´[[מְרוֹם ק]], cf. Di Du Kit Che:Hpt.
